short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Estimate C02 emissions of items on the Amazon Fresh website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows for you to see the carbon emissions of various items on the Amazon Fresh Website. Conveniently located next to the price of an item is the carbon emission estimate of the given item. Emissions are color coded to help understand what exactly is a high emission. You can view the total carbon emissions of your cart if you are on the cart view page.

You can also find information on the plugin and how to reduce your grocery carbon emission with the button "Learn about your groceries carbon emissions".
